nodes.text: The Th'irus system was located within Wild Space. It contained the planet Th'irus, home to the sentient Th'iruckai.

The Th'irus system was based on the planet Th'irus, created by the Star Wars Gamemaster Screen; however, in The Essential Atlas, it was spelt "Thi'rus." This misspelling later corrected in an update to the Star Wars: The Essential Atlas Online Companion.
